settings.title: The reason behind this
settings.subtitle: With more than 350 children under the age of five dying
settings.text: By drowning in pools each year nationwide, pool safety alarms should be mandatory.

settings.title: Who will benefit from this
settings.subtitle: If you’re always worried about what might happen in your own home, it’s time to make a change.
settings.text: Our SOSense swimming pool entry detection alarm has a detection range of up to 20 x 40 foot.

settings.title: When it’s to come out
settings.subtitle: The BETA product is now available for early bird backers.
settings.text: This enables us to further develop our life-saving pool alarm system and you will gain the final product free of charge as soon as it is released.

settings.title: How to purchase, become involved
settings.subtitle: Purchasing: The BETA product is now available for early bird backers.
settings.text: This enables us to further develop our life-saving pool alarm system and you will gain the final product free of charge as soon as it is released.
